section_info.title: Memberships_XX
section_info.details: _XXMemberships held as a student and professional, including voluntary and organisational affiliations.

memberships.title: ACS Associate Member_XX
memberships.description_full: _XXThe ACS is the professional association for Australia's information and communication technology (ICT) sector, driving technological excellence and professional standards.

memberships.title: DUSA Member_XX
memberships.description_short: Deakin University Student Association Member - Deakin University_XX
memberships.description_full: _XXDUSA provides student support, advocacy, and a range of services and clubs across all Deakin University campuses.

memberships.title: DSEC Member
memberships.description_short: Deakin University Software Engineering Club Member - Deakin University
memberships.description_full: Member of the Deakin University Software Engineering Club (DSEC), actively participating in coding events, workshops, and technical seminars focused on software development and engineering best practices.

memberships.title: DAIS Member
memberships.description_short: Deakin AI Society Member - Deakin University
memberships.description_full: Member of the Deakin AI Society (DAIS), involved in activities aimed at promoting the understanding and application of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning among students and researchers.

memberships.title: IEEE Student Member
memberships.organization_name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
memberships.description_full: Student Member of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE), the world's largest technical professional organization dedicated to advancing technology for the benefit of humanity.

memberships.title: EMBS Student Member
memberships.organization_name: IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBS)
memberships.description_short: IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBS) Student Member - IEEE
memberships.description_full: Student Member of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society (EMBS), focusing on advancing the application of engineering sciences and technology to biology, medicine, and healthcare.

memberships.title: IEEE Young Professionals
memberships.organization_name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE)
memberships.description_full: Member of the IEEE Young Professionals affinity group, dedicated to helping engineers and scientists transition into successful professional careers.

memberships.title: Advisor and Founding Member
memberships.description_full: Advisor and Founding Member of Programmers Arena at Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science and Technology University (HSTU), supporting competitive programming and software development skills among students.

memberships.title: Advisor_XX
memberships.description_full: _XXAdvisor for the Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) Club at HSTU, guiding students in academic and co-curricular activities, including technical workshops and events.
